name: JosÃ© Ottonello
description: I'm a frontend developer passionate about React and your stack its ecosystem. Innovative and empathic.

name: Main Stack
description: To insert myself into the IT universe, I started by carrying out projects with its three main languages: HTML markup language, CSS styling language and JavaScript programming language.

name: Advanced Stack
description: In order to achieve better performance and improve the quality of my projects, I decided to get learn React, the most demanded JavaScript library on the market; which is also collaborative with libraries like Redux that allows the management of states.

name: Libraries and Preprocessors
description: To keep code organizated and optimized I usually use SASS. This allows me to reuse many pieces of code, although I also often include libraries such as Bootstrap and Styled Components in my projects.

name: Database
description: Databases like SQL and Firebase allow me to store relational and non-relational data, in order to carry out the registration of user interaction with the website.

name: Version control system
description: Essential for any developer, Git allows me to store each of my projects, as well as go back to previous versions, branch the same project and keep finished projects stored without taking up space on my computer.

name: Project management software
description: Finally, use Notion to organize the daily tasks of the project you are doing, as well as document the information of each language, library and framework.

name: Ecommerce Vans
description: For this project i used React and their functional components, hooks like useState to store the status of the purchase, useEffect to optimize the performance of the application and useContext to manipulate the user's purchase. I've also integrated libraries like React Router to generate optimal routes without rendering and Material UI for simple and neat styling.

name: Online real state agency
description: I created this project with the goal of providing a more efficient alternative in real estate, saving time and money and allowing users to visit and reserve properties from the web. For this I used HTML, CSS and JavaScript in addition to Bootstrap and SASS.

name: Calculator App
description: One of the most conventional projects to practice programming logic, but very useful to speed up the use of functions, conditionals, classes, array methods and others. This functional calculator is a great help for everyday use.

name: Notes App
description: I thought of this project to maintain the entire study/work ecosystem on the computer. It was a great help for practicing using events, saving data to the browser's local storage, object and arrays methods, parsing to JSON, and more. It is an application that personally helps me a lot to organize myself since it is minimalist and practical.

name: To do List App
description: This To do List can serve as a complement to the previous application to break down the tasks and make them more specific and limited. For its creation, I used classes, destructuring, events, date handling and conditionals.
